name: Some old platformer I found that isn't very good
name_original: Some old platformer I found that isn't very good
description:
This was my first game I started working on! It's full of horrifying spaghetti code and it sucks. And now you can play it!

Can't do a browser build because this game is so poorly made it lags horribly.

How to play:

Z - jump/select menu item

X - Punch/whatever

C - interact or use quick select item

V - dash

F - toggle fullscreen

Enter - go to the pause menu with all the inventory and stuff
